page.title: 14LONG EATON. Transport.
page.content: Long Eaton forms the hub of the communications system of the East Midlands. ROADS. Long Eaton is at the intersection of important North South and East West Routes. The M1 runs to the west of the town. In early times a crossing point for the Trent was located at Sawley and Wilne about 5km to the west. CANALS. RIVERS. Long Eaton is well served by canals and river systems. Running North South the Erewash canal (1778) joins the River Trent at Trent Lock. Running East to West the Trent and Mersey canal link Nottingham with Liverpool. The River Soar navigation links Long Eaton and the East Midlands with London to the South.
